item.title: Vancouver 2010
item.description:
flickr-72157623346252133–10-Small–: _wpcom_is_markdown: ‘1’
I have the good fortune of living in a city that is hosting an Olympics!! I’ll be posting more pictures in the coming days in this set on flickr. You can also follow by subscribing to this RSS feed.
